channel.title: Compiler trouble
channel.description:
This is my Server compiler
[code]@echo off title Compiler :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d deps/Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause [/code]
When I run it I get this error
unrecognized option: -d
This is my Client compiler
[code]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java" -d /locandclass ./Javafiles/*.java ./Javafiles/sign/*.java pause [/code]
When I run it I get this error
Unrecognized option: -d
Any help?

item.title: Compiler trouble
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

runescape sucks:

java.exe should be javac.exe if it’s a compiler

good eye

@echo off title Compiler :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d deps/Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause
and try

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -d /locandclass ./Javafiles/*.java ./Javafiles/sign/*.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler trouble
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

try

@echo off title Compiler :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java.exe" - cp . -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/RuneTopListV2.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d deps/Data/CompiledFiles source\server\model\items\*.java source\server\model\minigames\*.java source\server\model\npcs\*.java source\server\model\objects\*.java source\server\model\players\*.java source\server\model\players\skills\*.java source\server\model\players\packets\*.java source\server\model\shops\*.java source\server\net\*.java source\server\task\*.java source\server\util\*.java source\server\world\*.java source\server\util\log\*.java source\server\*.java source\server\clip\*.java source\server\world\map\*.java source\server\clip\region\*.java source\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause
and try

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_07\bin\java.exe" - cp . -d /locandclass ./Javafiles/*.java ./Javafiles/sign/*.java pause

Read full topic
